extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v3.4.6 - Jan. 16, 2020[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Another fix for this weeks TVDB change to SSL. Seems this week some shows are back to working with legacy SSL support while others do not. What this now means is urllib2.urlopen() request works for some shows while requests.get() works for others. When the request does not satisfy the SSL requirement the response xml's are empty yet server still responds with <Response 200> I've now coded a check for the first request and if the xml's are empty then we'll use requests.get(). This appears to now get all shows back to laoding season/episode lists.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed settings.xml typo from last update.[/I]
